import React from 'react'; import { Trophy, Medal, Award, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; import { mockLeaderboard } from '../utils/mockData'; const Leaderboard = () => { const getBadgeIcon = (badge) => { switch (badge) { case 'Gold': return ; case 'Silver': return ; case 'Bronze': return ; default: return null; } }; const getRankStyle = (rank) => { switch (rank) { case 1: return 'bg-gradient-to-r from-yellow-400 to-yellow-600 text-white'; case 2: return 'bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-300 to-gray-500 text-white'; case 3: return 'bg-gradient-to-r from-orange-400 to-orange-600 text-white'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'; } }; return (

{getBadgeIcon(user.badge)}
{user.rank}

{user.username}

₹{user.portfolioValue.toLocaleString()}

+{user.gainPercentage}%

))}
{/* Full Leaderboard Table */}

All Rankings

Updated every 15 minutes

{user.username.substring(0, 2).toUpperCase()}

{user.username} {user.username === 'You' && ( You )}

₹{user.portfolioValue.toLocaleString()} +{user.gainPercentage}% {user.badge ? (
{getBadgeIcon(user.badge)} {user.badge}
) : ( - )}

); }; export default Leaderboard;
